_jsonapi.description: An object describing the server’s implementation

_meta.description: Meta information about the request or response

allOf.description: A resource with attributes and relationships

self.description: Link for refetching the curent results

prismaCode.description: Prisma error code if the error is thrown by Prisma

zodErrors.description: Zod validation errors if the error is due to data validation failure

related.description: Link for fetching the resource represented by this relationship

_toManyRelationshipRequest.description: Input for manipulating a to-many relationship

_toOneRelationshipRequest.description: Input for manipulating a to-one relationship
